languages.text: Во время варп-перелета в инженерном отсеке возникли неполадки: когитаторы ускорителей перестали подчиняться техножрецам, и на несколько минут системы древних машин были предоставлены самим себе. Серьезных поломок и инцидентов удалось избежать. Несколько служителей Машинного культа получили епитимью в виде сервиторизации, вдобавок боцман выдал несколько тройных вахт пустотникам, которые припомнили старые слухи о "проклятом корабле".

There was a malfunction in the engineering chamber during the warp journey: the accelerator cogitators stopped obeying the Tech-Priests, and for a few precious moments the ancient machines were left to their own devices. The crew managed to avoid serious breakdowns or accidents. Several acolytes of the Cult Mechanicus were turned into servitors as penance, and the bosun gave out several triple watches to the voidsmen who dredged up the old rumours about "the cursed ship."
languages.original_text: Во время варп-перелета в инженерном отсеке возникли неполадки: когитаторы ускорителей перестали подчиняться техножрецам, и на несколько минут системы древних машин были предоставлены самим себе. Серьезных поломок и инцидентов удалось избежать. Несколько служителей Машинного культа получили епитимью в виде сервиторизации, вдобавок боцман выдал несколько тройных вахт пустотникам, которые припомнили старые слухи о "проклятом корабле".

The crew managed to avoid serious breakdowns or accidents. Several acolytes of the Cult Mechanicus were turned into servitors as penance, and the bosun gave out several triple shifts to the voidsmen who brought up the old rumors about "the cursed ship."

languages.text: 亚空间航行期间，工程舱内发生了故障。负责加速思考器不再听从技术祭司的指挥，在那宝贵的几分钟之内，那群古老的机器开始肆意胡作非为。到最后，船员成功避免了严重的故障或事故。为了赎罪，机械修会的几个侍仆被改造成了奴工，而船员领班则给那些重提“受诅之船”谣言的人安排了长达几巡的加班工作。
languages.original_text: There was a malfunction in the engineering chamber during the warp journey: the accelerator cogitators stopped obeying the Tech-Priests, and for a few precious moments the ancient machines were left to their own devices. The crew managed to avoid serious breakdowns or accidents. Several acolytes of the Cult Mechanicus were turned into servitors as penance, and the bosun gave out several triple watches to the voidsmen who dredged up the old rumours about "the cursed ship."

traits.locale_text: 亚空间航行期间，工程舱内发生了故障。负责加速思考器不再听从技术祭司的指挥，在那宝贵的几分钟之内，那群古老的机器开始肆意胡作非为。到最后，船员成功避免了严重的故障或事故。为了赎罪，机械修会的几个侍仆被改造成了奴工，而船员领班则给那些重提“受诅之船”谣言的人安排了长达几巡的加班工作。

languages.text: Durante el viaje por la disformidad se produjo una avería en la cámara de ingeniería: los cogitadores del acelerador dejaron de obedecer a los tecnosacerdotes y, durante unos preciosos instantes, las viejas máquinas quedaron abandonadas a su suerte. La tripulación consiguió evitar averías o accidentes graves. Varios acólitos del Culto Mechanicus fueron convertidos en sirvientes como penitencia, y el contramaestre repartió varias guardias triples a los soldados del vacío que desenterraron los viejos rumores sobre la «nave maldita».
languages.original_text: There was a malfunction in the engineering chamber during the warp journey: the accelerator cogitators stopped obeying the Tech-Priests, and for a few precious moments the ancient machines were left to their own devices. The crew managed to avoid serious breakdowns or accidents. Several acolytes of the Cult Mechanicus were turned into servitors as penance, and the bosun gave out several triple watches to the voidsmen who dredged up the old rumours about "the cursed ship."

traits.locale_text: Durante el viaje por la disformidad se produjo una avería en la cámara de ingeniería: los cogitadores del acelerador dejaron de obedecer a los tecnosacerdotes y, durante unos preciosos instantes, las viejas máquinas quedaron abandonadas a su suerte. La tripulación consiguió evitar averías o accidentes graves. Varios acólitos del Culto Mechanicus fueron convertidos en sirvientes como penitencia, y el contramaestre repartió varios turnos triples a los soldados del vacío que desenterraron los viejos rumores sobre la «nave maldita».

languages.text: <歪み>を航海中、技術室に誤動作が発生した。加速考算機は技術司祭に従わなくなり、重要な場面では、古の機械が機能を任されることになる。クルーは、なんとか重大な故障や事故を免れた。機械教団の数人のアコライトは贖罪としてサーヴィターに変わり、甲板長は「呪われた船」という古い噂を蒸し返したヴォイズマンに3倍のシフトを与えた。
languages.original_text: There was a malfunction in the engineering chamber during the warp journey: the accelerator cogitators stopped obeying the Tech-Priests, and for a few precious moments the ancient machines were left to their own devices. The crew managed to avoid serious breakdowns or accidents. Several acolytes of the Cult Mechanicus were turned into servitors as penance, and the bosun gave out several triple watches to the voidsmen who dredged up the old rumours about "the cursed ship."

traits.locale_text: <歪み>を航海中、技術室に誤動作が発生した。加速考算機は技術司祭に従わなくなり、重要な場面では、古の機械が機能を任されることになる。クルーは、なんとか重大な故障や事故を免れた。機械教団の数人のアコライトは贖罪としてサーヴィターに変わり、甲板長は「呪われた船」という古い噂を蒸し返したヴォイズマンに3倍のシフトを与えた。

languages.text: Un dysfonctionnement s'est produit dans la salle d'ingénierie pendant le trajet dans le Warp : les cogitateurs de l'accélérateur ont soudain cessé d'obéir aux technoprêtres, laissant pendant quelques instants critiques les anciennes machines livrées à elles-mêmes. Fort heureusement, l'équipe parvient à éviter toute panne ou tout incident grave. En guise de pénitence, plusieurs acolytes du Culte Mechanicus sont transformés en servitors, et le maître d'équipage donne plusieurs triples quarts à tous les cosmomarins qui ont fait resurgir les vieilles rumeurs concernant la malédiction du vaisseau.
languages.original_text: There was a malfunction in the engineering chamber during the warp journey: the accelerator cogitators stopped obeying the Tech-Priests, and for a few precious moments the ancient machines were left to their own devices. The crew managed to avoid serious breakdowns or accidents. Several acolytes of the Cult Mechanicus were turned into servitors as penance, and the bosun gave out several triple watches to the voidsmen who dredged up the old rumours about "the cursed ship."

traits.locale_text: Un dysfonctionnement s'est produit dans la salle d'ingénierie pendant le trajet dans le Warp : les cogitateurs de l'accélérateur ont soudain cessé d'obéir aux technoprêtres, laissant pendant quelques instants critiques les anciennes machines livrées à elles-mêmes. Fort heureusement, l'équipe parvient à éviter toute panne ou tout incident grave. En guise de pénitence, plusieurs acolytes du Culte Mechanicus sont transformés en serviteurs, et le maître d'équipage donne plusieurs triples quarts à tous les cosmomarins qui ont fait resurgir les vieilles rumeurs concernant la malédiction du vaisseau.

languages.text: Es gab während der Warp-Reise eine Fehlfunktion in der Technikkammer: Die Beschleunigungs-Cogitatoren gehorchten den Techpriestern plötzlich nicht mehr, und einige wertvolle Augenblicke lang waren die uralten Maschinen sich selbst überlassen. Die Crew konnte einen schweren Aus- oder Unfall verhindern. Mehrere Akolythen des Kult Mechanicus wurden zur Strafe in Servitoren verwandelt, und der Bootsmann ließ die Raumfahrer Dreifachwachschichten arbeiten, weil sie die alten Gerüchte vom "verfluchten Schiff" wieder aus der Mottenkiste geholt hatten.
languages.original_text: There was a malfunction in the engineering chamber during the warp journey: the accelerator cogitators stopped obeying the Tech-Priests, and for a few precious moments the ancient machines were left to their own devices. The crew managed to avoid serious breakdowns or accidents. Several acolytes of the Cult Mechanicus were turned into servitors as penance, and the bosun gave out several triple watches to the voidsmen who dredged up the old rumours about "the cursed ship."

traits.locale_text: Es gab während der Warpreise eine Fehlfunktion in der Technikkammer: Die Beschleunigungs-Cogitatoren gehorchten den Techpriestern plötzlich nicht mehr, und einige wertvolle Augenblicke lang waren die uralten Maschinen sich selbst überlassen. Die Crew konnte einen schweren Aus- oder Unfall verhindern. Mehrere Akolythen des Kult Mechanicus wurden zur Strafe in Servitoren verwandelt, und der Bootsmann ließ die Raumfahrer Dreifachschichten arbeiten, weil sie die alten Gerüchte vom "verfluchten Schiff" wieder aus der Mottenkiste holten.

languages.text: Öteboyut yolculuğu sırasında mühendislik odasında bir arıza meydana geldi: Hızlandırıcı kavramsayarlar, Tekno Rahiplere itaat etmeyi bıraktı. Kadim makineler, birkaç kritik saniye boyunca kendi başlarına hareket etti. Mürettebat, ciddi bir arıza ya da kazayı önlemeyi başardı. Cult Mechanicus'un birkaç havarisi, kefaret olarak hizmelete dönüştürüldü ve eski "lanetli gemi" söylentilerini yeniden dillendiren uçsuz erlerine üstleri tarafından üçlü vardiya cezası verildi.
languages.original_text: There was a malfunction in the engineering chamber during the warp journey: the accelerator cogitators stopped obeying the Tech-Priests, and for a few precious moments the ancient machines were left to their own devices. The crew managed to avoid serious breakdowns or accidents. Several acolytes of the Cult Mechanicus were turned into servitors as penance, and the bosun gave out several triple watches to the voidsmen who dredged up the old rumours about "the cursed ship."
